entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a professor who beckons students forward imperiously. She thrusts her carpetbag into Crabbe's chest and her cloak into Goyl e's.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is one of the students who receives a carpetbag from Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: goyl e
entities.description: Goyl e is one of the students who receives a cloak from Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is one of the students who alerted the world to the return of You-Know-Who.

entities.name: professor snape
entities.description: Professor Snape is a professor who is asked for his opinion on awarding points to Potter and his friends.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is the entity that was returned.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall gave her carpetbag to Crabbe.
Professor McGonagall gave her cloak to Goyl e.
Potter and his friends alerted the world to the return of You-Know-Who.
Professor McGonagall thinks Potter and his friends should be awarded points for alerting the world to the return of You-Know-Who.
Professor Snape is asked for his opinion on awarding points to Potter and his friends.
